author: Dave Hampton <david.hampton@gmail.com> (davehamptonusa)
name: attr5
description: Attibute Creator that uses ECMAscrript 5 Property Descriptors to change attribute construction into a more declarative syntax.  Modeled loosly after MOOSE (perl) and JOOSE (javaScript) but not requiring the porting or entire objects to a new system.  It intermingles with fine with objects not using this attibute constructor.  Designed for Node.js.
